content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius regional district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property between two parties referred to as defendant 2 and the applicant defendant 2 was ordered to pay €115 for stamp duty and €415 for legal fees the court awarded defendant 2 with a car called audi a6 but also ordered them to pay the applicant €500 as compensation for property acquired during the marriage both parties were declared jointly and severally liable for a consumer credit agreement with a creditor named b additionally defendant 2 was personally held liable for another consumer credit agreement with a creditor named uab s the legal text also references various articles in the civil code that deal with property and obligations between spouses the summary also mentions that the marriage between i l j and v j is being dissolved and outlines their requests for child custody maintenance payments and division of property the court partially granted both the application and the counterclaim awarding the car to defendant 2 and ordering equal shares of the outstanding credit to be paid by both parties the court also addressed the costs of the proceedings with defendant 2 being ordered to pay the applicants lawyers fees maintenance payments for the children were granted and defendant 2 was ordered to pay stamp duty and postage costs

metadata.cost: 115 EUR (stamp duty) + 415 EUR (legal fees) to be borne by the defendant
